name: Summer Camps
description: RIT summer camps provide education and community building opportunities that allow students to continue their adjustment process. Youth practice English, share their culture with others, make lasting friendships, and discover the beauty of the Bay Area.
fullDescription: RIT summer camps provide education and community building opportunities that allow students to continue their adjustment process. Youth practice English, share their culture with others, make lasting friendships, and discover the beauty of the Bay Area.
whatTheyOffer: RIT summer camps provide education and community building opportunities that allow students to continue their adjustment process. Youth practice English, share their culture with others, make lasting friendships, and discover the beauty of the Bay Area.
howToGetIt: Call or email us to make an appointment
